alert.note: Alert for Clinch; Echols; Southern Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 04 at 1:05PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Baker, northern Columbia, northeastern Suwannee, eastern Hamilton, southeastern Echols, southeastern Ware and southeastern Clinch Counties through 145 PM EST... At 104 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Needmore to 6 miles west of White Springs. Movement was east near 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... White Springs, Fargo, Belmont, Needmore and Suwannee Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
